SceneDescription.name: Bratticus's Bedroom
SceneDescription.description:
Lord Borkus's hellspawn stands in the doorway with a manic grin on his face and his hands behind his back.
Assassin: [I'm pretty sure my hatred for this demon has overwritten any memory I might have of his real name. Not that it matters. "Bratticus" is far too appropriate for him.]
Assassin: "...What do you want, kid?"
Bratticus: "That fire was awesome! I wanna try that now!"
The little monster scampers away, revealing what he was holding behind his back.
Assassin: [That's a blowtorch.]
Assassin: ...
Assassin: "SHIT!"

action.description:
As you dash out the door, your quarry lets out a fierce battle cry.
Bratticus: "TO THE MUSIC ROOM!"
